game.name: Ariel Wedding Hairstyle And Dress
game.description:
Get ready to behave like a professional fashion designer in another highly challenging and addictive brand new dressing challenge! You will meet with the most beautiful and gorgeous princess Ariel who is on the cloud 9 today because of being married with her prince. The beautiful princess has come to your salon in a search for a new wedding hairdo and makeup. Join Ariel Wedding Hairstyle And Dress game and show off the world that you are blessed with the ultimate talents of hairstyling and beautician!
Your objective in this brand new dressing game for girls is not only to design the lovely wedding hairstyle, but also work on her makeup and dress up part. Find all the professionals on both sides of the screen to make her look charming yet romantic! Keep your eyes on your computer, mobile phone, tablet or gaming console to see what instructions you need to follow to complete your task in this one of the best girls games! Give her hair shampoo and a proper shower and do not forget to use the hairdryer to make them look attractive!
She is pretty confused and nervous, but your supporting hands will guide you towards becoming the most beautiful bride. After her hairstyling, make sure to follow all the steps to make her skin glow. Do everything including the implementation of mashkara, liner, lipstick and making eyebrows in this html5 makeover game! Change her outfit as well to make her look bride! Enjoy this mobile phone game sitting on stairs, having a cup of coffee or tea in a cafeteria or in a park, without download! Have fun during your spare time!!
